title: Announcement, Glass Installations: Charles Bird, Larry Cressman, Suzy Surek, 1990
title_raw: Glass Installations: Charles Bird, Larry Cressman, Suzy Surek
signed: Signature imprinted in blue, wavy pattern, left edge, center: DESIGN: EDWARD FELLA,; upside down: A STONES THROW AWAY
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in blue, upper half, center: CHAR ES BIRD/ L RRY/ CRES MAN/ SUZY  URECK; in off-white (paper) on blue bar, upper half, center, downward, crossing previous text: GLASS; across upper center: INSTALLATIONS; in blue, left edge, center: CURATOR:/ M ARY/ SHAF FER/ M A RCH 23-/ A P RIL/ 20, 19 90; in off-white on blue bar, across lower center: DETROIT 743   DE TROIT/ F O CUD BEAUBIEN   MI CH IG AN/ GALLERY T HI RD FLOOR  48226; in blue, lower left quadrant: MA CH23/ O PEN NG; in off-white on blue bar, lower left quadrant, crossing previous text: FRIDAY; lower left quadrant, along lower edge: 5:30 8:30 PM; in blue, lower right quadrant: :NO N TO 6 P M,/ WED-SAT RDAY; in off-white on blue bar, downward, crossing previous text: HOURS; lower right quadrant, lower edge: (313)962- 9 025  

Verso: Imprinted in blue, forming wavy patterns, center: ALSO IN THE AREA: DETROIT ARTISTS MARKET OPENING:/ CAMPBELL, KACHADORIAN, MAGSIG, ROST, YOUNG/ 5-7:30 PM, FRIDAY, MARCH 23; across lower right quadrant: DETRO IT FOCUS GALLERY/ ACROSS FROM THE BRICKTOWN PEOPLE MOVERSTATION/ 743 BEAUBIEN, 3RD FLOOR/ DETROIT, MICHIGAN48446/ WITH SUPPORT FROM THE:/ NATIONAL COUNCIL FOR THE ARTS/ MICHIGAN COUNCIL FOR THE ARTS/ DETROIT COUNCIL OF THE ARTS/ EQUAL OPPORTUNITY ORGANIZATION/ MEMBER OF NAA O; lower right quadrant: NON-PROFIT ORG/ BULK RATE/ U.S. POSTAGE PAID/ DETROIT, MICHIGAN/ PERMIT NUMBER 29 60
description:
Poster announcement for exhibition at Detroit Focus Gallery, designed to be mailed.  Printed in dark blue ink. 
Recto: Combination of text in blue on off-white and off-white text on blue bars, gives exhibition title, participating artists, curator, location, dates, times. 
Verso: Upper left quadrant, abstract shadow-like shape.  Lower half, text arranged in wavy
patterns, (some words bold), giving sponsors and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Glass Installations: Charles Bird, Larry Cressman, Suzy Surek, 1990. Offset lithograph on off-white paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-49
